verses.text: Yo, Paul here, God’s chosen apostle, with my dude Timothy, sending mad love to Colossians saints in Christ.
Grace and peace from God the Father and Jesus Christ, leveling up your soul game.
We flex gratitude to God every time we think of y’all, hearing about your faith vibes and love for the squad of saints.
Your faith? Legendary status. Everyone talks about it, lowkey hyped.
And that hope you’re holding for heaven? Eternal, unshakable, no cap.
The gospel you caught? It’s live, fruit-bearing, going global—full energy.
Big ups to Epaphras, our faithful homie, representing you and the squad.
He spilled all the tea on your love in the Spirit, showing God flexing in your lives.
So we keep praying, asking God to fill you with max wisdom and next-level spiritual insight.
Walk worthy of the Lord—live big, do good deeds, glow up in Him.
Strengthened with power through the Spirit; endure, stay patient, keep joyful—boss-level.
Shoutout to the Father, who made you fit for your ultimate heavenly inheritance.
He rescued us from darkness, pulling us into the kingdom of His Son—VIP access.
Jesus cleared our sins, making us holy and blameless in God’s eyes—full reset.
He’s the image of the invisible God, firstborn over all creation—OG flex.
All stuff was made through Him, everything in the universe—thrones, powers, authorities, rulers—all for Him.
He’s before everything, holding it all together like ultimate glue.
He’s the head of the church, firstborn from the dead, Supreme Boss over all.
God was hyped to have all His fullness dwell in Him—total power move.
Through Him, God reconciles everything to Himself, making peace via the cross—game changer.
We were once far from God, enemies in mindset, now reconciled, holy, blameless—VIP squad.
Stand firm in faith, rooted, no shifting with hype waves.
This is the gospel you heard; hold tight, live it, glow up in maturity.
I rejoice in my sufferings for you, filling what’s lacking in Christ’s afflictions for the church—lowkey grind.
God gave me the stewardship of His mystery, fully revealed—next-level flex.
The mystery hidden for ages? Now revealed to His saints—mind blown.
That mystery? Christ in you—the hope of ultimate glory—boss energy.
We preach Him, teach, and warn everyone, making disciples who are peak-level spiritually.
My grind? Working hard according to God’s power within me, nonstop, 24/7—no cap.
Yo, Paul here, lowkey heavy in spirit for you, and for Laodicea, making sure you’re fully woke in God’s vibes.
I want you fully encouraged, tied together in love, and knowing the full squad plan God set.
All wisdom and knowledge treasures? Fully packed in Christ—no hacks, no cap.
Don’t get played by smooth-talking hype merchants flexing empty philosophies.
I repeat: my presence may be lacking, but my heart is fully with you.
Grab Jesus and keep walking in Him, living the high-energy vibes of His life.
Rooted, built up, faith stacked, overflowing in gratitude—maxed out.
Watch out—don’t let anyone flex human traditions or worldly rules over you, empty hype.
Full Godness? Lives in Christ, bodily—ultimate boss flex.
He’s the head of all powers, supreme over everything—OG authority.
In Him, spiritual glow-up: circumcised in heart, reborn in Spirit, no skin-only moves.
Buried with Him in baptism, raised with Him by faith in God’s power flex.
Even dead in sins? God made you alive with Christ, straight-up grace download.
He wiped the slate, erased the record of debts against us, nailed it to the cross—destroyed the vibes of sin.
Stripped rulers and powers, exposed publicly, flexed total victory on the cross.
Don’t let anyone judge you for food, drink, festivals, new moon, or sabbaths—these are shadows.
Those shadows? Pointing to Christ—the real deal, full substance, ultimate energy.
Nobody should flex control over you with fake humility, angel visions, or empty bragging.
Christ is head, holding everything together; the church grows aligned under Him—full squad synergy.
If you died with Christ to the world’s vibes, why live under rules like “don’t handle, don’t taste, don’t touch”? Pure dead energy.
Rules are temporary, just shadows pointing to the real flex in Christ.
Don’t get trapped in human commandments and teachings—they can’t beat flesh desires or resurrect the spirit.
Those rules look spiritual on the outside, showing wisdom, humility, or strictness—but inside? They’re powerless against sin. Straight-up fake flex energy.
If you’re vibing with Christ—like dead-to-the-old-you—look for the real stuff above, not the earth grind.
Keep your mind locked on heaven stuff, not petty human chaos.
You’re dead in the old grind; your life? Hidden in Christ, ultimate cloak flex.
When He pops up, your life will flex publicly, fully revealed—glory squad move.
Kill the earth vibes: sexual sins, lust, evil desires—total wipeout.
Greed? That’s straight-up idolatry. Remove it from your squad.
That stuff is coming for you, like fire—God’s wrath isn’t cap.
Don’t lie, slander, rage, or curse—leave the old self in the dust.
Stop fronting with each other; old self tricks = extinct.
Put on the new self: renewed, full of God energy, getting smarter every day.
No squad divisions: Jew, Greek, slave, free—Christ smashes all barriers.
Now, roll with compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness, and patience—new self flex.
Forgive each other, just like Christ forgave you—no receipts, pure energy.
Most importantly? Love. Love stacks it all together perfectly, ultimate glue.
Let peace run your squad—Christ called you together as one body, max unity.
Wisdom? Let it flow. Sing psalms, hymns, spiritual remixes with gratitude in your heart.
Whatever you do—talk, grind, or vibe—do it in Jesus’ name. Big thanks to God.
Wives, respect your husbands, full-on respect mode.
Husbands, love your wives, no lowkey rage—keep it clean, real flex.
Kids, obey your parents, no backtalk—this pleases the Lord, not just humans.
Parents, don’t cap your kids; no threats, no toxicity—let them grow in God energy.
Slaves (workers under authority), obey earthly bosses with respect and sincerity, not just eyes-on-the-paycheck energy.
Whatever you do, work like God sees you—heart in it, not just human applause.
Remember, you’re grinding for the Lord, not humans—eternal rewards flex.
Wrongdoing gets its payback; God’s justice is on point—no favoritism, full checkmate.
Bosses, treat your workers right—God’s watching. No unfair vibes, pure respect energy.
Pray hard. Keep alert. Be on that thankful flex 24/7.
Pray for us too—Paul’s crew needs doors open, God moves, messages spread, unblocked grind.
Pray I can spit wisdom in words that make God flex, not get blocked by haters.
Live smart with outsiders, flex with that God wisdom, make every move count.
Let your talk be salted, seasoned right, so you can drop truth vibes everywhere.
Tychicus, faithful squad member, brings news, encourages hearts—real MVP vibes.
I’m sending him so you can get the full scoop and know what’s really popping in our squad.
Onesimus, our brother in the grind, a faithful soldier, sends his greetings too.
Aristarchus, my ride-or-die in prison, greets you. So does Mark, Barnabas’ cousin. If he rolls with you, welcome him with open squad energy.
Jesus, called Justus, real men of the squad here—true comfort for me, sending love.
Epaphras, my hype man for you in prayer, grinding for you with tears, so you stay strong and full of God energy.
He’s repping you hard in chains, fighting for you in the spiritual realm.
Luke, the doc, and Demas send love. Real ones keeping it 100.
Greet the squad in Laodicea, and Nympha’s house crew, and the church meeting in her pad.
Read this letter in your squad circles, make sure everyone gets the vibe. And this letter? Share it with Colossae.
Tell Archippus: “Stay woke in the mission, keep the grind alive.”
Paul signs it himself—remember, my hand seals this. Keep it real, for the grace of God is massive.
